attributes.action: Ban fireworks that bang and stop frightening our pets
attributes.additional_details: Children can enjoy fireworks without the need for them to make loud banging noises
attributes.background: Every year for around 8 week banging from fireworks can be heard throughout the night, my dog and almost all others are petrified of these noises and are frightened to leave the house.   Even when bonfire night is over pets take weeks to return to their normal routine.
